recipe.title: Mashed Sweet Potato with Citrus
ingredients: 1 teaspoon finely grated fresh orange zest
instructions: Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 425°F. Prick potato all over with a fork and bake in a small baking dish until tender when pierced with a small sharp knife, about 1 hour. When potato is cool enough to handle, peel off skin with knife. Mash potato with remaining ingredients.
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 425°F.
